pages.about-us: About LuxeBlend - Where Luxury Meets Innovation LuxeBlend HOME ABOUT US PRODUCTS CONTACT Discover How LuxeBlend Works At LuxeBlend, we're dedicated to simplifying beauty routines and enhancing your natural allure. Our products are meticulously crafted to deliver exceptional results, providing you with the confidence to shine every day. From nourishing skincare essentials to vibrant makeup hues, LuxeBlend offers a comprehensive range of beauty solutions tailored to meet your needs. Experience the luxury of effortless beauty with LuxeBlend. EXPLORE NOW Explore Our Featured Products Luxurious Formulas Experience the epitome of luxury with our meticulously crafted formulas. Each product is designed to pamper your skin and enhance your natural beauty. Natural Ingredients Discover the power of nature with our products enriched with pure and potent ingredients. Nourish your skin with the goodness it deserves. Efficient Delivery Enjoy fast and reliable delivery services that bring your favorite LuxeBlend products right to your doorstep. Experience convenience like never before. Versatile Range Explore a diverse range of products tailored to suit every individual's needs and preferences. From skincare essentials to makeup must-haves, we've got you covered. Unveiling Beauty in Every Product At LuxeBlend, our dedication lies in creating cosmetics that redefine beauty standards. We strive to empower individuals to express themselves confidently through our meticulously crafted products. From skincare essentials to makeup must-haves, LuxeBlend is committed to enhancing your natural allure and helping you shine inside and out. pages.privacy-policy: LuxeBlend Privacy Policy - Protecting Your Personal Information LuxeBlend HOME ABOUT US PRODUCTS CONTACT Confidentiality Protocol for LuxeBlend LuxeBlend manages the luxeblend.com website, which offers the SERVICES. This page serves to inform visitors about our protocols regarding the gathering, utilization, and disclosure of Personal Information for those who choose to utilize our Services via the LuxeBlend website. By opting to utilize our Services, you agree to the collection and utilization of information in line with this protocol. Any Personal Information collected is used to provide and enhance the Services. We commit not to utilize or distribute your information with any entity other than as outlined in this Confidentiality Protocol. The terminology employed in this Confidentiality Protocol carries the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, accessible at luxeblend.com, unless specifically defined otherwise in this Confidentiality Protocol. Data Gathering and Utilization To optimize your experience while using our Services, we may request certain personally identifiable information, such as your name, phone number, and postal address. This information is utilized to contact or identify you. Browser Data It's important to note that whenever you access our Services, we collect data transmitted by your browser, known as Browser Data. This may include your computer's Internet Protocol ("IP") address, browser version, pages visited, time and date of visit, duration of visit, and other statistical information. Tracking Mechanisms Tracking mechanisms like cookies are utilized to gather data and enhance our Services. You have the option to accept or decline these tracking mechanisms and receive notifications when they are being transmitted. Refusing these mechanisms may limit certain features of our Services. External Partners We may engage third-party entities to assist in various aspects of our Services, including facilitation, provision, performance, and analysis. These parties have access to your Personal Information solely for the purpose of fulfilling their assigned tasks, with an obligation to maintain confidentiality. Data Protection We highly value the trust you place in us by providing your Personal Information and employ commercially acceptable measures to safeguard it. However, we cannot guarantee absolute security due to the inherent risks associated with internet transmission and electronic storage. External Links Our Services may contain links to external sites. Clicking on these links redirects you to sites not operated by us. We recommend reviewing the Privacy Policies of these sites as we have no control over their content or practices. Children's Privacy Our Services are not directed at individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal identifiable information from children under 13. If such information is discovered, we promptly delete it from our servers upon notification. Policy Modifications We reserve the right to update our Confidentiality Protocol periodically. Any alterations will be promptly posted on this page, and we encourage you to review it regularly. Changes become effective immediately upon posting. Contact Information If you have any queries or suggestions regarding our Confidentiality Protocol, please feel free to reach out to us. The LuxeBlend website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline Baiwandi, Maharashtra, India luxeblend@gmail.com +91-8240014544 Disclaimers Privacy & Policy Terms & Conditions

pages.terms-conditions: LuxeBlend Terms and Conditions - Rights and Responsibilities LuxeBlend HOME ABOUT US PRODUCTS CONTACT Terms of Service Welcome to LuxeBlend! These terms of service outline the rules and regulations for the use of LuxeBlend's Website, located at luxeblend.com. By accessing this website, we assume you accept these terms of service. If you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page, do not continue to use LuxeBlend. The following terminology applies to these Terms of Service, Privacy Statement, and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements: "Client", "You", and "Your" refer to you, the person accessing this website and compliant to the Company's terms and conditions. "The Company", "Ourselves", "We", "Our", and "Us", refer to our Company. "Party", "Parties", or "Us", refers to both the Client and ourselves. All terms refer to the offer, acceptance, and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of our assistance to the Client in the most appropriate manner for the express purpose of meeting the Client's needs in respect of the provision of the Company's stated services, in accordance with and subject to, prevailing law of in. Any use of the above terminology or other words in the singular, plural, capitalization, and/or he/she or they, are taken as interchangeable and therefore as referring to the same. Tracking Mechanisms We utilize the use of tracking mechanisms. By accessing LuxeBlend, you agree to the use of these tracking mechanisms in agreement with LuxeBlend's Privacy Policy. Most interactive websites use tracking mechanisms to provide a personalized experience for each visit. These mechanisms are employed by our website to facilitate the functionality of specific areas, making the website navigation more user-friendly. Additionally, some of our affiliate/advertising partners may also utilize tracking mechanisms. Intellectual Property Unless otherwise stated, LuxeBlend and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on LuxeBlend. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from LuxeBlend for your personal use, subject to the restrictions set out in these terms and conditions. You are prohibited from: Reproducing material from LuxeBlend Selling, renting, or sub-licensing material from LuxeBlend Duplicating or copying material from LuxeBlend Redistributing content from LuxeBlend Parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the website. LuxeBlend does not filter, edit, publish, or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of LuxeBlend, its agents, and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who posts their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, LuxeBlend shall not be liable for the Comments or for any liability, damages, or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website. LuxeBlend reserves the right to monitor all Comments and to remove any Comments which can be considered inappropriate, offensive, or causes a breach of these Terms of Service. You warrant and represent that: You are entitled to post the Comments on our website and have all necessary licenses and consents to do so; The Comments do not invade any intellectual property right, including without limitation copyright, patent, or trademark of any third party; The Comments do not contain any defamatory, libelous, offensive, indecent, or otherwise unlawful material which is an invasion of privacy The Comments will not be used to solicit or promote business or custom or present commercial activities or unlawful activity. You hereby grant LuxeBlend a non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, edit and authorize others to use, reproduce and edit any of your Comments in any and all forms, formats or media. Hyperlinking to our Content The following organizations may link to our Website without prior written approval: Government agencies; Search engines; News organizations; Online directory distributors may link to our Website in the same manner as they hyperlink to the Websites of other listed businesses; and System wide Accredited Businesses except soliciting non-profit organizations, charity shopping malls, and charity fundraising groups which may not hyperlink to our Web site. These organizations may link to our home page, to publications or to other Website information so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products and/or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party's site. We may consider and approve other link requests from the following types of organizations: commonly-known consumer and/or business information sources; dot.com community sites; associations or other groups representing charities; online directory distributors; internet portals; accounting, law and consulting firms; and educational institutions and trade associations. We will approve link requests from these organizations if we decide that: (a) the link would not make us look unfavorably to ourselves or to our accredited businesses; (b) the organization does not have any negative records with us; (c) the benefit to us from the visibility of the hyperlink compensates the absence of LuxeBlend; and (d) the link is in the context of general resource information. These organizations may link to our home page so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party's site. If you are one of the organizations listed in paragraph 2 above and are interested in linking to our website, you must inform us by sending an e-mail to LuxeBlend. Please include your name, your organization name, contact information as well as the URL of your site, a list of any URLs from which you intend to link to our Website, and a list of the URLs on our site to which you would like to link. Wait 2-3 weeks for a response. Approved organizations may hyperlink to our Website as follows: By use of our corporate name; or By use of the uniform resource locator being linked to; or By use of any other description of our Website being linked to that makes sense within the context and format of content on the linking party's site. No use of LuxeBlend's logo or other artwork will be allowed for linking absent a trademark license agreement. iFrames Without prior approval and written permission, you may not create frames around our Webpages that alter in any way the visual presentation or appearance of our Website. Content Liability We shall not be hold responsible for any content that appears on your Website. You agree to protect and defend us against all claims that is rising on your Website. No link(s) should appear on any Website that may be interpreted as libelous, obscene or criminal, or which infringes, otherwise violates, or advocates the infringement or other violation of, any third party rights. Reservation of Rights We reserve the right to request that you remove all links or any particular link to our Website. You approve to immediately remove all links to our Website upon request. We also reserve the right to amen these terms and conditions and it's linking policy at any time. By continuously linking to our Website, you agree to be bound to and follow these linking terms and conditions. Removal of links from our website If you find any link on our Website that is offensive for any reason, you are free to contact and inform us any moment. We will consider requests to remove links but we are not obligated to or so or to respond to you directly. We do not ensure that the information on this website is correct, we do not warrant its completeness or accuracy; nor do we promise to ensure that the website remains available or that the material on the website is kept up to date. Disclaimer To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we exclude all representations, warranties and conditions relating to our website and the use of this website. Nothing in this disclaimer will: limit or exclude our or your liability for death or personal injury; limit or exclude our or your liability for fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation; limit any of our or your liabilities in any way that is not permitted under applicable law; or exclude any of our or your liabilities that may not be excluded under applicable law. The limitations and prohibitions of liability set in this Section and elsewhere in this disclaimer: (a) are subject to the preceding paragraph; and (b) govern all liabilities arising under the disclaimer, including liabilities arising in contract, in tort and for breach of statutory duty.
